description.displayText: My family loves Kadie. She fit right in to our tribe & I always knew my son was in superb hands. She is fun, kind, sweet & loving. My 3 year old son would often tell me how much fun he has with her. They spent lots of time outdoors, which my son loved!!!! He also loved her sweet pup. I enjoyed her being around & I valued her time, energy & care. Kadie is a top pick. I feel so grateful & blessed to have had her as our nanny. She's incredible in all the ways.

description.displayText: Kadie is great with my daughter. She is the best caregiver I could have dreamed for! Also has been great to work with on flexible times/days.
description.originalText: Kadie is great with my daughter. She is the best caregiver I could have dreamed for! Also has been great to work with on flexible times/days.

description.displayText: Kadie is amazing with our children, they love her a lot. She is very good with them, and always picks up after them.
description.originalText: Kadie is amazing with our children, they love her a lot. She is very good with them, and always picks up after them.

description.displayText: I have known Kadie for most of her life.  She has always been a kind and caring person. She has taken care of my two daughters (10 and 7) since they were little. She has also helped me with my home childcare business.  She always shows up on time, is eager to work and always has a smile on her face. I would highly recommend her to care for your children. She is amazing and I wish she still lived in Colorado.
description.originalText: I have known Kadie for most of her life.  She has always been a kind and caring person. She has taken care of my two daughters (10 and 7) since they were little. She has also helped me with my home childcare business.  She always shows up on time, is eager to work and always has a smile on her face. I would highly recommend her to care for your children. She is amazing and I wish she still lived in Colorado.

description.displayText:
I have had the pleasure of knowing Kadie for approximately eight years.  During the years of our acquaintance, I have known Kadie in many capacities. She began as my Mother's Helper with the birth of my first child eight years ago. Her responsibilities in that capacity grew with the increasing activity level of my oldest child and more than doubled with the birth of my second child six years ago.  

Upon Kadie's successful completion of the babysitting and CPR class approximately 5 years ago, Kadie began babysitting my children.  Without a doubt she has remained my children's (and their parents') favorite babysitter.

In addition to babysitting my children, I have also employed Kadie to house and pet sit during our multi-week vacations for the past three years.

Kadie is an intelligent, capable, friendly, and compassionate young woman. She is always quick on her feet, with sensible reactions in all the circumstances I've seen her in. I feel confident in saying that she is capable of handling any situation with thoughtfulness and maturity.

I am happy to speak with any prospective employers.

Sincerely, 
Mick
